website_summaries.verdict: High-quality set of shin guards for older youth and adult players that has nice wrap-around protection.
pros: Protects the sides of the legs from foul tips with extra-wide padding
Can adjust or remove some of the pads to ensure the most comfortable fit
Includes a triple knee cap design for maximum protection in this sensitive area
cons: Protection for the top of the foot is a bit smaller than some other options

customer_reviews.title: Nice at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice shin guards. My son is about 5'8", 16 and the 16.5 fit him well. They have great knee pads that adjust and really make a difference for blocking drills. They are a bit bulky but I cannot imagine how anyone could ever get a knee or shin blow in them. You will need to adjust and cut unless you are Earl Campbell. He has kept the foot guards on for now but I can see how they might get in the way. We paired this with the G3 chest protector and he is pretty much bulletproof as long as it hits the pad
customer_reviews.author: aaluck

customer_reviews.title: Save the shins
customer_reviews.text: These shin guards were purchased for the father of a softball pitcher. Our daughter is now 13 and pitches around 55 MPH. It was to the point that getting some protection was necessary for the protection of my husbands shins. Learning new pitches can sometimes mean a strange bounce or a wild pitch as she perfects her craft. These guards arrived on time and were everything the description proclaimed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them after some adjustments
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them, but be warned, when we opened the box they looked HUGE! I had to work the plastic by bending over and over again until they were more form fitted to her legs. This took a couple hours of manipulating the plastic which initially made her legs about twice as wide as they are. If I hadn't formed them to her legs they would have continued to stick out on both sides and get in the way when she moved. Now that the fitting is correct, she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Sepanic

customer_reviews.title: They make good HEMA shin guards too
customer_reviews.text: Not just for baseball. They make good HEMA shin guards too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Safe on the Mound
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. I pitch softball and use them. It's funny I haven't been hit with a ball since I started using them. Before I was like a target
customer_reviews.author: mattjp8

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Guards
customer_reviews.text: These guards are very good. Can't wait to see them in use. Very well padded and they look as though they will protect very well. Very comfortable. Will team this up with a Chest Protector and a G4 Helmet. Great Combination.
customer_reviews.author: Jr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Saaaaweeeet Product!!!! Amazing, light weight, awesome protection. Should have bought these years ago!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: pnlek5150

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno has wonderful baseball gear for catchers.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew used these for the first time last week for his game and, although his team lost, he loved the fit, comfort and protection the Misuno catcher's gear afforded him.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl & Norma Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Best Catchers Legs on the market! My kiddo had a growth spurt and they always have the size we need
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Did not have the strap with clasp with the knee area like show in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Eric A Franck

customer_reviews.title: They've lasted through little league and travel baseball and we're amazingly still in great shape - although obviously scuffed u
customer_reviews.text: My son just got his second pair of these shin guards - and he only needed new ones because he outgrew the first pair that he had for many years. They've lasted through little league and travel baseball and we're amazingly still in great shape - although obviously scuffed up.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Perlow

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect and she uses knee savers too
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grand daughter, for playing 14U softball. They fit perfect and she uses knee savers too. Best deal and they were off the shelf !
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, and I like the fact that you ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, and I like the fact that you can buy the shin guards and chest protector separately. Not all body's are the same type
customer_reviews.author: Andre Barnachie

customer_reviews.title: Great shin guards at a very good price
customer_reviews.text: With this purchase, I also bought other Mizuno softball equipment. We are very happy with all of the Mizuno items and would recommend them to anyone wanting a very good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: copper1947

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd pair and my daughter loves the protection they give her
customer_reviews.author: Amy phinney

customer_reviews.title: Great shin guards
customer_reviews.text: Great shin guards, wished I had a pair back when I played. If I had to buy another pair I would buy these
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dyche

customer_reviews.title: For son
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes the shin guards. They cover his legs very well. Look good too. Would buy again. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit. Great Protection.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Stays in place. Does not come unhooked easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: We use these to practice shin-kicks in martial arts. They stay on well and take the impacts repeatedly. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: micalake

customer_reviews.title: Good value and comfort for catchers
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son is tall and large for his age and these fit excellent and he can't stop raving about how much more comfortable they are to drop and block with.
customer_reviews.author: mightymouseaj

customer_reviews.title: really good. Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: yeah. really good. Easy to put on, great fit and look stellar.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Banana recommends

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great for my daughter, she loves the feel of them an loves that they fit her great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno shin guards are the boss
customer_reviews.text: my 13 year old daughter wears these for her travel softball team. she is the main catcher and she looks so intimidating.
customer_reviews.author: dndsyn

customer_reviews.title: top notch quality
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my 17 year old son who catches for his high school varsity baseball team. He is very satisfied with the quality and durability along with the comfort fit. He is definitely sold on this product.
customer_reviews.author: hvac dude

customer_reviews.title: Fit was perfect and surprised at how much more mobility is gained
customer_reviews.text: Fit was perfect and surprised at how much more mobility is gained. Running for a foul is much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they have seen a lot of use and are in good shape.
customer_reviews.text: They fit, they worked, they have seen a lot of use and are in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits my daughter very well and she is very pleased with the quality of the product
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Kresinske

customer_reviews.title: Professional Quality Shin Guards
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product to anyone looking for a high quality, sturdily-constructed shin guard at a reasonable price. The guards are highly adjustable to get a comfortable fit. Toe guard can be adjusted to get optimal coverage based on your personal crouch style. There is also a removable knee cap pad that helps take the shock out of blocking pitches in the dirt. The straps are very long to accommodate even the thickest of shins and knees, just cut off the extra to avoid unwanted strap-flapping.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Paul

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gaurds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and the fit, feel, and protection is greet. She loves them. She is thirteen and they will last her for quite a few years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Bigj

customer_reviews.title: Liked them so much I updated them
customer_reviews.text: These are my second set, I replaced an old set in the next size up. They are great and I will get them again if needed
customer_reviews.author: Kikkin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gear. Well constructed. Great fit. What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rzepczynski

customer_reviews.title: good equipment is worth its weight in gold when it ...
customer_reviews.text: good equipment is worth its weight in gold when it comes to personal injury. Solid and dependable gear here. Only complaint is the color marking design on the front seems to wear off faster than I think it should, but the padding and plastic has done a great job
customer_reviews.author: Dksimons

customer_reviews.title: great quality - held up for my 15 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: great quality - held up for my 15 year old for the whole season last year, and will be able to use it this year also. he plays in high school and travel, so a season is 5 months and hundreds of games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy with caution
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. This product description is misleading you only receive ONE SHIN GUARD not two like most packages way overpriced for a single.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 14 year old based on correct leg measurements. They were huge and bulky. My son hated them and he looked like a transformer! Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: crowny

customer_reviews.title: I love these shin pads
customer_reviews.text: I love these shin pads. They are really light and helped me move around with no problems at all. Very solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H Miller III

product_meta.title: Mizuno G3 Samurai Shin Guards
product_meta.description: The Mizuno Samurai Shin Guards G3 features innovative construction for durability, comfort, and lightweight performance. Mizuno's patented, detachable K-Pad allows the player to find his perfect fit, and provides critical knee protection. The Samurai Shin Guards G3 also feature a detachable/movable toe cap and provides more protection on the inner shin.
feature_bullets: Patented detachable K-Pad for superior fit and knee protection
